text: @jimsciutto Lets sum this up - Killed Americans, Still killing Americans, collapsed the economy, lost 45M jobs, Covid19 still rampant maybe worse then the beginning, schools maybe out for the yr ... apprentice pres @realDonaldTrump golfing !! WAKE UP AMERICA!!
